p.span: Once a Bear Always a Bear!
We Miss and Love you All!
From all the BISD Teachers and Staff!

span.span: Together we can do what we cannot do alone! The staff at BISD is committed to being flexible during this transitionary time. We are here for you, please email any concerns or questions at any time. On our website you will have access to every teachers homepage, which includes their contact information. Please make sure to check the pages daily as each teacher will have daily lesson plans including assignments.

span.a: BALMORHEA ISD ANNOUNCING CLOSURE BEING EXTENDED

span.span: A Message from BISD Superintendent, Mr. John Massey 3-23-2020
** I wanted to ensure that everyone received this letter. We are trying our best to get all the devices passed out, but the list has changed drastically since last week. ~Mr. John Massey

span.a: County of Reeves, Texas, County Judge Declaration of Local State of Disaster

span.span: Frequently Asked Questions for BISD Posted 3-20-20
Recommended Daily Schedule for HS Posted 3-20-20
Free breakfast and lunch is being distributed to children in Balmorhea and Saragosa. Click here for more information. Posted 3-20-20
**No Grab N Go on Friday, April 10
and on Monday, April 13th, will resume on Tuesday, April 12th

span.a: Click here for instructions to access your account information

span.span: Click here for Instructions to Sign in to Gmail Account
****Please set up your school gmail account, as this is the only email account teachers will use to communicate with you.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background: white; text-align: center;

u.span: BISD Online School will begin Monday, March 23, 2020.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background: white; text-align: center;

span.span: Please click one of the tabs above: "Elementary", "Middle School", or "High School" and navigate to each individual teacher’s page to access your assignments. Each teacher will have lessons posted.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background: white; text-align: center;

span.span: Elementary teachers have talked to each parent. If you have questions regarding instruction please contact your child’s teacher.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background: white; text-align: center;

span.span: It's a first for all of us so there will be questions, issues and some confusion, BUT together we can do this!!

p.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background: white; text-align: center;
margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background: white; text-align: center;

span.span: BISD teachers have contact information on their webpages, please reach out if you have any questions.

div.h4: BALMORHEA ISD ANNOUNCING CLOSURE BEING EXTENDED Posted Date: 04/01/2020
div.p:
BALMORHEA ISD ANNOUNCING CLOSURE BEING EXTENDED
Given the rapidly evolving situation with COVID-19, Balmorhea ISD will extend the suspension of normal district operations indefinitely (through May . . .
